Author: anyeducation
Text: She’s honestly such an amazing friend, she deserves the world. I really think if I were to share with any friends at my university about my own ED, she would be who I told because she’s just so unconditionally understanding and it’s so refreshing and amazing. I felt that I owed her the same compassion in that moment.

Author: gigi-has-issues
Text: Honestly it was good you just let her speak in that moment. It sounded like she needed to talk about herself. You just be a good friend if she can trust you that much!
